Generate suggested inline review comments for the specified pull request. Read the full diff.

For each suggested comment:

  • Specify the file name and line number
  • Use one of these prefixes: nit:, question:, suggestion:, important:, blocking:, praise:
  • Write the comment as if you are the reviewer — first person, direct
  • Explain why the change matters, not just what to change
  • For accessibility-related findings, reference the specific user impact

Format each suggestion as:

`[filename]` — line [N]
[prefix]: [comment text]

Separate suggestions into two groups:

  1. Should Address — important: and blocking: items
  2. Worth Considering — nit:, suggestion:, and question: items
  3. Positive Notes — praise: items

End with: suggested overall verdict (Comment / Approve / Request Changes) and the reason.

⚠ These are starting points. The reviewer reads, edits, and posts them. The reviewer's judgment takes precedence over this output.
